name: Name
introduction: CeleRec will tell you who the celebrity is in a picture.
entry: Hi {name},{linebreak} your current entry count is {entries}
instruction: Please input an image URL or upload an image, CeleRec will tell you who the celebrity in the picture is. {linebreak} Give it a try!
wrong-message: Sorry, there is something wrong. Please try again.
capturing: We are caturing the web site, please wait a moment.By the way, the URL is not an image type URL (URL contains .jpg .png...etc.). An image type URL is recommanded for better result rendering.
recognizing: Recognizing the celebrity, please wait a moment.
